message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $950,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product offers you significant value beyond that price.  Would you consider $900,000?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $875,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
